alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 26 at 1:51PM CDT until October 27 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Precipitation will be mostly rain this afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Pennington; Red Lake; West Polk
